name: Kaya Loves Mushrooms (Mushrooms Hate Kaya)
description:
I created this game for the TIGsource Versus Competition in 2011. I wanted to do something asymetrical, with one player using the mouse, and the other using the arrow keys. At some point I decided to digitally paint the levels, and that's why there are only three including the tutorial.

I'm actually still really proud of this project, even though it's very broken in a lot of ways. It's definitely the most work I've ever put into a digital game.

This was my chance to collaborate with the tallented Artem Bank, he made a lot more songs than actually made it into the final game, and you can listen to the whole soundtrack on his Bandcamp.

Let me know if you play this one, and let me know who you played against! You can contact me on twitter @metalsnail or on My Tumblr.

CHEATS:
  • Click on the Os in "Kayla Loves Mushrooms" to view gameplay modes that didn't make it into the final game.
  • Type G to activate gibs and N to turn them off.
